page.title: 10YOUNG PEOPLE cont
page.content: go into Plymouth (about 15 miles away) for entertainment so again transport is a problem.Most people interviewed would like to get a motorbike or pass their driving test as soon as possible,though not many thought they would be able to afford it! It was noticeable that the 11 to 12 year old age group found more to do with their spare time than those over 15.Activities mentioned were walking, fishing,cycling,and helping on the farms. Job prospects are not at all good within this area as the only employment is in farming.Although some farmers sons were intending to take over from their fathers,mechanisation of farming has meant that fewer and fewer jobs are available.Other people coming up to school leaving age said that they would certainly have to
